article.headline: Rider 74, Marist 67
article.story: POUGHKEEPSIE, N.Y. (AP) -- Edwin Muniz scored 25 points and Jerry Johnson added 22 to lift Rider over Marist 74-67 Friday night. The Broncos (14-10) ran away with the game early and took a 39-31 lead at halftime. Marist opened the second half with a layup by Carl Hood to make it 39-34, but that was the closest they came the rest of the way. Hood led the Red Foxes (5-17) with 17 points, while Will McClurkin had 12 points and 10 rebounds. Brandon Ellerbee had 10 points and Chris Handy added 10 rebounds.
